pullRequest.title: fix: allow trailing slash in listeners config (MINOR)
pullRequest.bodyText:
fixes #4668
Description
See the description in the issue, we should allow listener IPs with trailing slash (e.g. http://localhost:8080/)
Testing done
Unit testing
Reviewer checklist

 Ensure docs are updated if necessary. (eg. if a user visible feature is being added or changed).
 Ensure relevant issues are linked (description should include text like "Fixes #")

commit.message: fix: allow trailing slash in listeners config
